Article.Ticker: Pillars of Eternity Card Game
Article.Title: Pillars of Eternity: Lords of the Eastern Reach Kickstarter
Article.Content:
Hello, backers. Obsidian has some very exciting news! Today marks the first day of a brand new Kickstarter for the Pillars of Eternity card game, Lords of the Eastern Reach.
Lords of the Eastern Reach is a strategic card game of adventure and empire building based on Pillars of Eternity. You must protect and build a city. Hire heroes and troops for defense or to delve into dangerous dungeons for loot and glory. Build towers, blacksmiths and other buildings to gain the advantage and go for the win.
If you would like to back and get your hands on your own copy, head over to the game's [url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2081578473/pillars-of-eternity-lords-of-the-eastern-reach-car/]Kickstarter page[/url] and donate.

Article.Ticker: IMPORTANT: Change to Auto-attack
Article.Title: A change to auto-attack and how to fix it.
Article.Content:
In 2.00 we have made a change to auto-attacking so it is more integrated in our new AI system. One of the consequences of this is that your party members may not be auto-attacking until you set their AI to do so.
You can set your party member AI to perform in the previous manner by selecting a party member and right-clicking on their [url=http://media.obsidian.net/eternity/media/news/action-bar.jpg]AI icon in the action bar[/url]. Once the AI package menu appears you will want to set the [url=http://media.obsidian.net/eternity/media/news/package-options.jpg]Class Behavior to "None" and Auto-attack to "Defend Self."[/url]
To tell if your party member's AI is active just look at their AI icon. If the icon is highlighted, it means that their AI is active.

Article.Ticker: 2.03 Now Live
Article.Title: 2.03 is now live.
Article.Content:

If you would like to see the latest patch notes, please go [url=http://forums.obsidian.net/blog/7/entry-189-update-notes-203/]here[/url].
Here is a quick run down of some major fixes: -Fixed an issue that was causing certain quests to take experience instead of granting it. -Fixed a problem with chanters not being able to set their chants properly after they have retrained. -Fixed an issue where retraining was allowing characters to obtain unlimited skill points. -Using store filters now only shows the appropriate items instead of graying out other items in the store panel. -Fixed multiple issues with the stronghold and how it interacted with DLC content. -Fixed an issue that caused the main character to lose his or her background shortly after character creation.

Article.Ticker: Pillars of Eternity: The White March Part 2 Now Available!
Article.Title: Pillars of Eternity: The White March Part 2 is Out Now!
Article.Content:
Hey, everyone! The second part of the White March expansion is out now along with the 3.0 update on Steam, GOG and Origin.
Check out the [url=http://forums.obsidian.net/blog/7/entry-190-update-notes-300/]patch notes[/url] for the new features and changes that have gone into the game with the 3.0 update.
Here is a quick run down of just some of the new features: -New content for the Stronghold that has you, as lord or lady of Caed Nua, decide the fate of your vassals and send your companions on new and exciting adventures. -There is also a new quest line that allows you to defend your claim to Caed Nua. -Knockout Injuries have been added as an option for those that want it. Injuries are added to characters that are knocked out in battle and are only removed by resting. -Story Time mode has been added. This difficulty setting is for people that want to experience the Pillars of Eternity story without having to build a party of adventurers focused on combat.

Article.Ticker: Missed the Deadfire Campaign? Slacker Backer is Open!
Article.Title: Missed the Deadfire Campaign? Slacker Backer is Open!

Article.Ticker: Last Month in the Deadfire. Vol. One!
Article.Title: What's Been Happening with Pillars II in the Past Month?
Article.Content:
March brought some pretty awesome news to those following the Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?utm_source=Obsidian&utm_campaign=CF17&utm_medium=ingame]Fig campaign[/url] and we're here to bring the highlights to you!
- First up, if you haven't had the chance to pledge for Deadfire, you can do so either as a Slacker Backer on [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?utm_source=Obsidian&utm_campaign=CF17&utm_medium=ingame]Fig[/url] or over on our [url=http://eternity.obsidian.net/backer]Eternity Backer Portal[/url]
- Over in [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?update=291#updates]Update #23[/url] we dived into the lore behind one of the creatures you'll find in the Deadfire, the naga!
- We discussed the state of the project and where each department currently is with their work on Deadfire in [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?update=298#updates]Update #24[/url].
- The Eternity Backer Portal opened up to allow you manage your pledge and we put all of the information in [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?update=303#updates]Update #25[/url] to help you get your pledge all set as well as set up [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?update=304#updates]Update #26[/url] to answer frequently asked questions about the Backer Portal.
- Then finally, we took a deep dive into the factions of the Deadfire (part 1!) with [url=https://www.fig.co/campaigns/deadfire?update=311#updates]Update #28[/url], the Príncipi and the Huana.
That's a ton of great information on Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire and it's only one month out from the campaign ending. By this time next month, we'll have more to share with you. Until then, thank you all for your support. You are all incredible!

Article.Ticker: The Cast of Critical Role Joins Deadfire!
Article.Title: The Cast of Critical Role Joins Deadfire!
Article.Content:
Exciting news, Watchers! Today we are happy to [url=http://eternity.obsidian.net/news/critical-role-and-obsidian-entertainment-announce-partnership-for-pillars-of-eternity-ii-deadfire]announce a partnership[/url] with the entire cast of Critical Role! Everyone in the cast will be joining DM and veteran voice actor, Matthew Mercer, in Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire. They'll be playing key roles in the game and help to bring the world of Pillars II to life.
With this partnership we are also bringing a free DLC to Deadfire that will allow players and fans of Critical Role to have character voice sets and player portraits based on the characters the Critical Role cast made popular during their Vox Machina campaign.
